title: How to root my Honor Play smartphone - Quora

response.answer_text: Warning:- Do not try any methods to unlock the bootloader. In order to root an android smartphone you need to unlock the bootloader. And in order to unlock the bootloader you need an unlocking key from the manufacturer and since April 2018 Huawei has blocked any and all methods you can obtain that code. So there is no way you can obtain this code.

There are lot's of options available for rooting android smartphone 📱 . But for every smartphone has different root procedures has to follow. try kingroot or root using supersu(unlock bootloader, flash custom recovery, install supersu).
